note.p: Clergyman. LLB, Cambridge, 1844; LLD, 1853. Ordained, 1848. Vicar of Brentwood, Essex, from 1854. Lived at Warley House, Great Warley, Essex. A trustee of the marriage settlement of Francis Rhodes (from 1850 Francis Darwin) and Charlotte Maria Cooper Darwin, who married in 1849.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/1651/49/27)
Essex, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1918 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 June 2021)
